column1: 23956,X-Factor (2005) #42,42,31997,77,"After the shocking events of the past few issues, MADROX has learned that in X-FACTOR, anything can happen. And in this issue-everything does! Separated from his teammates and involved in a war he never expected to see, he can only look back on the days when the team stood together. Now-the rebellion has begun!,2009,4
